item.title: Russia's Central Bank to Test Blockchain Messaging System
item.description:
Russia's Central Bank to Test Blockchain Messaging System

Russia's Central Bank is testing Blockchain technology with selected partner banks via a new consortium - but it will not involve the previously-touted "Russian Bitcoin." Also read: Time for Russia 'To Ban Bans' Says Putin Business Advisor At the International Finance Congress June 3-4 in St.

item.title: NetCents Bitcoin Payment Gateway Partners with BitStamp - NEWSBTC
item.description:
NetCents Bitcoin Payment Gateway Partners with BitStamp - NEWSBTC

The Vancouver-based NetCents Bitcoin payments processor has partnered with BitStamp to gain entry into the European market. Read more... NetCents Technology Inc. (CNSX: NC), the Vancouver-based online payments platform has announced its partnership with the leading European Bitcoin exchange BitStamp. The partnership will provide NetCents access to the European market.

item.title: The DAO Disaster Illustrates Differing Philosophies in Bitcoin and Ethereum
item.description:
The DAO Disaster Illustrates Differing Philosophies in Bitcoin and Ethereum

July 04, 2016 - Posted by Kyle Torpey on Analysis In the fallout of the recent disaster known as The DAO, the Ethereum community is trying to figure out how to properly rectify the situation. Code that would allow miners to signal support for a hard fork for the purpose of refunding DAO token holders is expected to be available in most Ethereum clients soon.

item.title: New EU Proposals Seek to End Anonymous Bitcoin Trading
item.description:
New EU Proposals Seek to End Anonymous Bitcoin Trading

The European Union (EU) has been working on plans to fight against tax avoidance strategies since the Panama Papers scandal in May, where leaked documents exposed how the rich and powerful use tax havens to hide their wealth. Also read: EU Parliament Approves Bitcoin Regulatory Guidelines The Panama Papers release was the largest document leak in history, far larger than the U.S.

item.title: EB138 - Sergio Lerner: How RSK Will Bring Smart Contracts To Bitcoin
item.description:
EB138 - Sergio Lerner: How RSK Will Bring Smart Contracts To Bitcoin

Security researcher and RSK co-founder Sergio Lerner joined us to discuss RSK (also Rootstock), the project to launch a turing-complete smart contract sidechain to Bitcoin. We talked about how he got into the industry, spending countless days analyzing Bitcoin for vulnerabilities and finding a few along the way.

item.title: Can Bitcoin full nodes pinpoint the true source of a transaction which they've relayed?
item.description:
Can Bitcoin full nodes pinpoint the true source of a transaction which they've relayed?

Bitcoin Stack Exchange is a question and answer site for Bitcoin crypto-currency enthusiasts. It's 100% free, no registration required. Sign up Here's how it works: Anybody can ask a question Anybody can answer The best answers are voted up and rise to the top In the bitcoin data dir there is a file called debug.log.

item.description:

Bitcoin Stack Exchange is a question and answer site for Bitcoin crypto-currency enthusiasts. It's 100% free, no registration required.

item.title: Trading Corporate Secrets Becoming New Darknet Industry
item.description:
Trading Corporate Secrets Becoming New Darknet Industry

The seemingly unstoppable growth of "darknet" marketplaces is creating a new commodity industry - corporate insider information. Also read: Cryptsy CEO Recruits Hackers to Recover Lost Coins The mainstream media would have you believe the dark web is primarily for distributing drugs and child pornography - much as they did with the regular Internet back in the mid-1990s.

item.title: Abra Bitcoin Remittance App Enters US Market | PYMNTS.com
item.description:
Abra Bitcoin Remittance App Enters US Market | PYMNTS.com

Abra, the bitcoin remittance app, has made its way to the U.S. - via the iPhone and Android app options. What that means is that Abra customers in the U.S. or the Philippines can send money to each other using the app's digital wallet that works with their bank accounts.
